message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $20,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can reach a more agreeable price. My counteroffer is $14,000.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $18,000? I believe this reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, my counteroffer remains at $14,000.
